app.name: Backend.AI
app.one_liner: A container-based computing cluster platform for hosting ML frameworks and programming languages with heterogeneous accelerator support.

screens.name: Session Dashboard
screens.purpose: View and manage active and historical compute sessions across projects and domains.

rust_commands.name: create_session
rust_commands.purpose: Initiate a new compute session with specified image, resources, and environment.

rust_commands.name: terminate_session
rust_commands.purpose: Gracefully shut down an active compute session and release its resources.

week 1: Implement session creation command with RBAC scope validation
week 1: Set up PostgreSQL tables for sessions, kernels, and images
acceptance_tests: KernelV2 resolver correctly returns associated agent and resource details via DataLoader
System enforces fair-share scheduling based on domain/project usage history when allocating resources
